Test Name: HIT Antibodies with Reflex to Serotonin Release Assay (SRA)
Purpose: To detect Heparin-Induced Thrombocytopenia antibodies and, if indicated, confirm platelet activation via the Serotonin Release Assay for accurate patient diagnosis and management.
Container: Lavender top (EDTA) or Blue top (Sodium citrate) tube for plasma; Red or Gold top tube for serum
Equipment: Centrifuge, HIT ELISA kit, Microplate reader, SRA reagents, Pipettes, Incubator
